title: Spectrum Is a CLI Music Player for Linux (Installation + Usage)
description:
Discover my new favorite console-based media player, known as Spectrum, with a built-in equalizer and fantastic look, and learn its installation and usage instructions.

The post Spectrum Is a CLI Music Player for Linux (Installation + Usage) appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Highlight Rows and Columns of Active Cell in LibreOffice Calc
description:
This is a simple guide to highlight rows and columns of active cells in LibreOffice Calc as you move around the spreadsheet.

The post Highlight Rows and Columns of Active Cell in LibreOffice Calc appeared first on Linux Today.

title: How to Install and Configure Zabbix Server and client on Rocky Linux 9
description:
Zabbix is a free and open-source monitoring solution for IT infrastructure such as networks, servers, virtual machines, and cloud services. In this tutorial, you will learn how to install the Zabbix Server and client on a Rocky Linux 9 server.

The post How to Install and Configure Zabbix Server and client on Rocky Linux 9 appeared first on Linux Today.
